name: Doc Sawbones
descriptions: Doc Sawbones is the camp medic in Camp Golf in 2281. He can be found in a tent just next to the trooper tents.

Doc Sawbones is Camp Golf's medical officer and oversees the health of the Rangers and troops. Though he seems very dissatisfied with his position as the camp doctor as troops will come in with the most minor of injuries. In fact, when the player character tells him they are hurt when they have full health, he openly expresses his frustration.

topics.topic_text: I think I might be addicted to something.
topics.response_text: Maybe you are and maybe you aren't, but I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.

topics.topic_text: I think I'll tough it out.
topics.response_text: Heh. Good luck with that. Just try to remember the Cazadores crawling out of your skin aren't real.
And there we go. Now, try to stay off the stuff, you hear?

topics.topic_text: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
topics.response_text: Maybe you are and maybe you aren't, but I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.
All right, just hold steady. Want a shot of whiskey to calm your nerves? Mind if I have one? Heh heh, little doctor humor there.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I'll be fine.
topics.response_text: You want to play tough guy, that's no skin off my nose.
I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.
Whatever you say. Hey, is that a little patch of ghoul rot on your cheek there?
This might tickle a little. Or it might cause searing, agonizing pain to shoot through your body. You never know.
I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.
Something I can do you for?
